column5: Wow what a long wait for my favourite Steelhead River to get fishable this fall- BUT the wait yielded one of the greatest QUALITY days I can remember with NON STOP ACTION on WILD STEELHEAD all day long.  You cant put a price on not seeing another soul but your fishing buddy over 2 miles of H2O, no garbage left behind by loogans, deer stopping to look us down and hundreds of Geese flying overhead.  All fish caught floatfishing roe with 4-6lb flurocarbon tippet just about everywhere we had 3 feet of water or more. Pools, runs, bend,overhangs,undercuts, pockets-DIDN'T MATTER.  Its gonna be a great 5 weeks of open season yet for 2007 and cashing in some lieu time to punish my elbow and shoulders some more. STAY TUNED for more reports.   Enjoy the    Caseysâ€™ first bow of the day    Marks First bow of the day    Average Size all day long    Hard to take    PERFECTION!!
That's what it's all about !!  Great pictures
what a  great day and fishing spot...!  kevin
Nice Fish, No crowds, No garbage, and you caught fish does it get any better?
great report and pics/video,that is what it is all about
Great report & beauty steelhead !!!!!!! nice pics too  ,love those creek & river scenery shots with the trout !!! cheers
Very nice! Steelheading with snow on the ground is certainly what pops into my mind when I think fishing in Nov/Dec!

HOPE THAT FISH HARVEST WAS KEPT TO A MINIMUM, THE OMNR HAS NOT STOCKED HURON SINCE THE 1980's.  THAT IS ONE OF MY HOME RIVERS. GLAD TO SEE YOU GOT A FEW. TODAY IT WAS TUFF CONS, BUT I MANAGED A FEW.....
